org.dotplot.ui.views
Class DotPlotNavigator

java.lang.Object
  ViewPart
      org.dotplot.ui.views.DotPlotNavigator
public class DotPlotNavigator
extends ViewPart

DotPlotNavigator allows navigating your file-system and to choose files to plot.

See Also:
ViewPart, Serialized Form
